member.name: T:MaxMind.GeoIPCountry
member.summary: Allows for looking up a country based on an IP address. See www.maxmind.com for more details.

member.name: M:MaxMind.GeoIPCountry.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of this class.
member.param: An already open stream pointing to the contents of a GeoIP.dat file.
member.remarks: The stream is not closed when this class is disposed. Be sure to clean up afterwards!

member.name: M:MaxMind.GeoIPCountry.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of this class, using an on-disk database.
member.remarks: The file will be closed when this class is disposed.

member.name: M:MaxMind.GeoIPCountry.GetCountryCode(System.Net.IPAddress)
member.summary: Retrieves a two-letter code, defined by MaxMind, which details the country the specified IP address is located.
member.returns: A two-letter code string. Throws exceptions on failure.
member.remarks: The IP address must be IPv4.

member.name: M:MaxMind.GeoIPCountry.TryGetCountryCode(System.Net.IPAddress)
member.summary: Retrieves a two-letter code, defined by MaxMind, which details the country the specified IP address is located. Does not throw exceptions on failure.
member.returns: Two-letter country code or null on failure.

member.name: M:MaxMind.GeoIPCountry.GetCountryNameByCode(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the English name of a country, by a country code.
member.param: Country code to look up, returned by GetCountryCode or TryGetCountryCode.
member.returns: English name of the country, or null on failure.

member.name: P:TShockAPI.Resources.groups
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to #Format #name parent permisson1 permission2 permissionN #if there is no parent, put null instead #groups inherit permissions from their parents #put a ! before a permission to negate it #Do not remove the group default #Do not name a group SuperAdmin, that is hard-coded into the code, it grants total permissions #ALWAYS DECLARE A GROUP'S PARENT BEFORE YOU DECLARE THE GROUP
#currently avaliable permissions: #reservedslot - reserved slot for player #canwater - allow players to use water #canlav [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:TShockAPI.Resources.itembans
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to #see https://github.com/TShock/TShock/wiki/Item-List for a list of item ids #List each banned item ID below this, with each on a new line.

member.name: P:TShockAPI.Resources.users
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to #format #ip group #see groups.txt for a list of groups #127.0.0.1 superadmin.
